alert.note: Alert for North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Itasca and north central Cass Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Lake Winnibigoshish, or 19 miles east of Bemidji, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca
